title: What are some good songs to listen to while driving at night? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I'm just driving at night, it really all depends on what mood I'm in... Some examples: Composers like Hans Zimmer    or Jon Brion    Psychedelic Rock; The Mars Volta    Hard Rock/Metal; Metallica    Or if I'm feeling nostalgic; Boston    Really it doesn't just end there. These are only examples I can think of off the top of my head. It all really depends on your mood and the kind of music you like. But that doesn't mean you should be afraid to explore or to try new things.

Ok Taking into account music that remind me of a night landscape at night while driving, I’d say… Spitz - Yoru wo Kakeru  Dover - Cherry Lee (probably a favourite)  Simon & Garfunkle - The Boxer  The Yellow Monkey - Tactics  Chris Isaak - Wicked Game (another favourite)  Chris Isaak has many good ones: Lie to Me, Blue Hotel… Amy MacDonald - This Is The Life (a third favourite)
